channel.title: Lua Factory on Victor Toso
channel.description: Recent content in Lua Factory on Victor Toso

item.title: Lua-Factory available upstream
item.description: It has been four months since the GSoC 2013 code submission. At that time the Lua-Factory Plugin was usable but yet with some issues to be dealt. It was in the last two weeks that most of those issues were solved together with a few recommendations from Juan and Bastien and tonight it was merged upstream in Grilo-Plugins repository. Hooray! The documentation for implementing a Lua sources will come soon.
